idioms.meaning: in every game or play, differences in skill between individuals can be substantial

idioms.word: 碁打ち鳥飼い馬鹿の中
idioms.reading: ごうちとりかいばかのうち
idioms.meaning: go players and bird keepers are idiots (both activities demand a lot of time)
go players have no concept of time (being so engrossed in the game)

idioms.word: 碁に凝ると親の死に目に逢わぬ
idioms.reading: ごにこるとおやのしにめにあわぬ
idioms.meaning: if you get too absorbed when playing go, you will miss your parent's deathbed
